layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x142
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x142
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x118
      RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x48
        RenderBlock {P} at (0,0) size 784x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 308x16
            text run at (0,0) width 308: "This paragraph should have a green background"
        RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,32) size 784x16
          RenderBlock {P} at (0,0) size 784x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
            RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 308x16
              text run at (0,0) width 308: "This paragraph should have a green background"

          RenderTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 231x50
            RenderTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 227x50 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderBlock {P} at (1,17) size 225x16
                RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 225x16
                  text run at (0,0) width 225: "This paragraph should be unstyled."
